\chapter{Nomenclature}

\begin{Nomencl}
\NomGroup{Variables}
    \item[$\theta$] elasticity of demand
    \item[$distance$] \UnitLine{population-weighted distance}{km}
\NomGroup{Vectors}
    \item[$\boldsymbol{\beta'w}_{idt}$] set of gravity covariates
\NomGroup{Subscripts}
    \item[$i$] importer
    \item[$j$] exporter
    \item[$t$] period
\end{Nomencl}
